title: 1109 21 "A Tough Decision! An Unusual United Front!"Transliteration: "Kujū no Ketsudan! Ishoku no Kyōtō Sensen!" (Japanese:苦渋の決断！異色の共闘戦線！) Directed by: Nanami MichibataStoryboarded by: Masahiro Hosoda & Nanami Michibata Jin Tanaka Masayuki Takagi June 23, 2024(2024-06-23) 3.5%[25]
